review.title: “Exploring journey...”
review.pros: Pros – It's a Growing company, so there's a growth for individual as well. Learning atmosphere. One can get lot of things to explore.
review.cons: Cons – It's still not a fully structured organization. Processes are still getting streamlined. Lot of things are unstructured.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Streamlining is necessary.... Good that you are doing it....

review.title: “Boardmembers just to passive aggressive”
review.pros: Pros – Still. Maintains some what of a family atmosphere
review.cons: Cons – Many of the employees perks have been cut back.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – You need to re-sharpen your pencils

review.title: “Great learning experience as regional head, reporting directly to CEO”
review.pros: Pros – Opportunity to handle P&L responsibility of a major region for the companyClose interpersonal relationship development - a key requirement for this roleHighly charged and energetic work environment where the week starts with a top management review and ends with a team review
review.cons: Cons – Work-Life balance gets affected due to 6 day working week.Weak HR, delays in hiring replacements, talent retention is weakVery weak IT and systems - affects productivity
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Outsource HR and talent managementImplement a strong IT-based solution for daily reporting and financial modeling
